name: Serious Car: Do Drive
description:
In the serious car, You touch right or left to speed up or slow down your car in order to avoid other hastily-moving vehicles, and collect coins to unlock new cool cars. This is a free fun, easy-to-play-hard-to-master game that will keep the player entertained for hours.

FEATURES:
- Leaderboards
- Achievements
- Trending Low Poly & Voxel graphics style
- Dozens of built-in cars to be unlocked with coins
- Earn coins every 10 mins using Reward System
